name: synonym
description: Display synonyms for a word on your CLI
readme:
Synonyms
=======

Synonym lookup tool for your CLI. After installing (`npm install -g synonym`)
simply use:

```sh
synonym anger
```

And synonym will spit out a bunch of synonyms from the princeton WordNet DB!
